thread.title: Doggie Dash & Dawdle

title: Doggie Dash & Dawdle
text: Co-ed   Join Animal Humane New Mexico for their annual Doggie Dash and Dawdle event in Balloon Fiesta Park. Highlights include a 5K chip-timed run and two-mile "fun walk" open to adults and children alike (dogs are welcome, but not required). After the race, guests can explore a Barketplace featuring an array of pet-related products and services, enjoy live entertainment, visit a "Doggie Carnival", watch the Flying Houndz Frisbee, Nosing Around Scavenger Hunt and more. Dogless visitors can even "Rent-a-Dog" for the day if they wish. Location
